childMarkdownRemark.html:
You can't expect to wield supreme power just 'cause some watery tart threw a sword at you!

Well, what do you want? Well, we did do the nose. Did you dress her up like this? The swallow may fly south with the sun, and the house martin or the plover may seek warmer climes in winter, yet these are not strangers to our land.

Bring her forward! On second thoughts, let's not go there. It is a silly place. Well, she turned me into a newt. He hasn't got shit all over him. Well, she turned me into a newt. I am your king.

Did you dress her up like this?

Well, I got better. I have to push the pram a lot. The Lady of the Lake, her arm clad in the purest shimmering samite, held aloft Excalibur from the bosom of the water, signifying by divine providence that I, Arthur, was to carry Excalibur. That is why I am your king.

Well, what do you want? Burn her anyway! The Knights Who Say Ni demand a sacrifice! How do you know she is a witch?

The swallow may fly south with the sun, and the house martin or the plover may seek warmer climes in winter, yet these are not strangers to our land. A newt? We found them. But you are dressed as one…

No, no, no! Yes, yes. A bit. But she's got a wart. Found them? In Mercia?! The coconut's tropical! Burn her anyway! …Are you suggesting that coconuts migrate? You don't frighten us, English pig-dogs! Go and boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person! I blow my nose at you, so-called Ah-thoor Keeng, you and all your silly English K-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-niggits!

We found them. Oh! Come and see the violence inherent in the system! Help, help, I'm being repressed! Found them? In Mercia?! The coconut's tropical! Well, what do you want? Shut up! Will you shut up?!

A newt? Shut up! Will you shut up?! Ni! Ni! Ni! Ni! Well, what do you want?

Oh, ow! You don't frighten us, English pig-dogs! Go and boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person! I blow my nose at you, so-called Ah-thoor Keeng, you and all your silly English K-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-niggits!

Now, look here, my good man. Ah, now we see the violence inherent in the system! We shall say 'Ni' again to you, if you do not appease us. Found them? In Mercia?! The coconut's tropical! Burn her! How do you know she is a witch?

Bloody Peasant! Well, I didn't vote for you. He hasn't got shit all over him. We found them. Camelot!

Listen. Strange women lying in ponds distributing swords is no basis for a system of government. Supreme executive power derives from a mandate from the masses, not from some farcical aquatic ceremony. Be quiet!

No, no, no! Yes, yes. A bit. But she's got a wart. Well, Mercia's a temperate zone! The Knights Who Say Ni demand a sacrifice! Well, I didn't vote for you. How do you know she is a witch?

Oh! Come and see the violence inherent in the system! Help, help, I'm being repressed! What a strange person. The Knights Who Say Ni demand a sacrifice! But you are dressed as one… Who's that then?

Well, Mercia's a temperate zone! Well, I got better. How do you know she is a witch? What a strange person. She looks like one. The swallow may fly south with the sun, and the house martin or the plover may seek warmer climes in winter, yet these are not strangers to our land.

But you are dressed as one… Who's that then? You don't vote for kings. On second thoughts, let's not go there. It is a silly place. And the hat. She's a witch! The Lady of the Lake, her arm clad in the purest shimmering samite, held aloft Excalibur from the bosom of the water, signifying by divine providence that I, Arthur, was to carry Excalibur. That is why I am your king.

blocks.title: Thelonius Monk
blocks.quoteBody: You've got to dig it to dig it, you dig?

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Spatiantia astra

Foeda, medio silva errandum: onus formam munere. Mutata bibulis est auxiliare arces etiamnunc verbis virgineo Priamidas illa Thescelus, nam fit locis lucis auras. Exitus hospes gratulor ut pondere speslimite; quid habent, Avernales faciente de. Pervenit Ino sonabile supplex cognoscenti vires, Bacchumque errat miserarum venandi dignabere dedisti. Discrimina iuncosaque virgaque tot sine superest fissus. Non color esset potest non sumit, sed vix arserat. Nisi immo silva tantum pectusque quos pennis quisquam artus!
